name: Escape the Fire (PalleMickzy)
description:
This is a project my teammate Joseph Turnquist and I made for the 2018-2019 OGPC competition under the theme "Scarcity".  A link to our WebGL is in the downloads. 

Tips: In a fire it is always best to keep moving and fire extinguishers will respawn every 10 seconds if you are not holding an extinguisher.
